statements: SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE conversation_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, message FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE chatbot_id = 3 ORDER BY conversation_date DESC;
SELECT chatbot_id, message FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY response_time ASC;
SELECT conversation_id, conversation_date FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE conversation_duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE message LIKE '%hello%' AND chatbot_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY conversation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, chatbot_id, conversation_date FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE conversation_duration > 10;
SELECT chatbot_id, message FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE response_time < 5 AND conversation_duration > 20 ORDER BY conversation_duration ASC;
SELECT conversation_id, user_id, response_time FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE conversation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT MAX(conversation_duration) AS longest_duration, MIN(conversation_duration) AS shortest_duration FROM chatbot_conversations;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_text, response_time_seconds FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT conversation_id, message_text, response_time_seconds FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE response_time_seconds > 10;
SELECT conversation_id, response_feedback FROM response_optimization WHERE optimization_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS conversation_count FROM chatbot_conversations GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT conversation_id, timestamp, message_text FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE response_time_seconds > 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT conversation_id, user_id, message_text, response_time_seconds FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE response_time_seconds IS NOT NULL ORDER BY response_time_seconds DESC, timestamp ASC;

SELECT C.conversation_id, C.timestamp, R.response_feedback FROM chatbot_conversations C JOIN response_optimization R ON C.conversation_id = R.conversation_id WHERE R.optimization_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY C.timestamp DESC;

SELECT U.user_id, COUNT(C.conversation_id) AS conversation_count FROM chatbot_conversations C JOIN response_optimization R ON C.conversation_id = R.conversation_id JOIN users U ON U.user_id = C.user_id GROUP BY U.user_id HAVING COUNT(C.conversation_id) > 3 ORDER BY conversation_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations;
SELECT conversation_id, message, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT chatbot_id, TIMESTAMP FROM chatbot_conversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT conversation_id, sentiment_score FROM conversation_metrics WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8;
SELECT chatbot_id, successful_conversations, failed_conversations FROM chatbot_performance WHERE successful_conversations > failed_conversations;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT MAX(response_accuracy) AS highest_accuracy FROM conversation_metrics;
SELECT chatbot_id, SUM(successful_conversations) AS total_successful_conversations FROM chatbot_performance GROUP BY chatbot_id;
SELECT conversation_id, message FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations;
SELECT conversation_id, user_id, bot_id, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = '123456';
SELECT bot_id, name, description FROM bot_data ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email, join_date FROM user_data WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT conversation_id, response_time, sentiment, feedback FROM conversation_metrics WHERE sentiment = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT conversation_id, response FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_data WHERE join_date > '2022-05-01';
SELECT bot_id, description FROM bot_data WHERE name = 'BotA';
SELECT conversation_id, response_time, sentiment FROM conversation_metrics WHERE feedback > 3;
SELECT * FROM User_Profiles;
SELECT user_name, email FROM User_Profiles WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT conversation_id, message FROM Chatbot_Conversations ORDER BY conversation_date DESC;
SELECT response_id, response_text, response_date FROM Chatbot_Responses WHERE response_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_sentiment FROM Message_Analysis;
SELECT user_name, email, location FROM User_Profiles WHERE last_active_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_active_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT conversation_id, chatbot_id, message FROM Chatbot_Conversations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY conversation_date ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_score, keyword FROM Message_Analysis WHERE conversation_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT response_text, response_date, response_time FROM Chatbot_Responses WHERE conversation_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND response_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT response_id, response_time, effectiveness_score, num_repeats FROM Response_Statistics WHERE response_time > '00:05:00' ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC,num_repeats ASC LIMIT 3;
